characters.Name: Woman
characters.Description: She is a wife and the owner of a small dog. She is very attractive and seductive.

characters.Name: Ace
characters.Description: He is a UPS delivery person. He is charismatic, eccentric, and unusual.

dialogue.Speaker: Woman
dialogue.Text: My little baby. You missed mommy didn't you? Did daddy hurt you? I won't let him, no I won't. He may have kept the big screen TV, but he's not gonna keep my baby. No, he isn't. Thank you, sir. How can I ever repay you?

dialogue.Speaker: Ace
dialogue.Text: Well, the reward would be good, and there was some damage to my...

dialogue.Speaker: Woman
dialogue.Text: Would you like me to take your pants off instead?

dialogue.Speaker: Woman
dialogue.Text: It takes a big man to stand up to my husband. He's already put two of my lovers in the hospital.

dialogue.Speaker: Ace
dialogue.Text: How did he find out? Does he have you followed.
